column4: hi guys im tryin to install some Tk thingo but when i try to do a makefile or run it im told that the file or directory doesnt exist
im in the folder that the makefile.pl is in but when i run sudo perl Makefile.Pl im told it doesnt exist can anyone help
the actual file is Makefile.Pl not makefile.pl
No problem, mate, we've all been there. I started ~3/4 year ago. Now, I know quite a bit :)
